metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25781 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in file_download.php in MantisBT before 2.24.3. Users without access to view private issue notes are able to download the (supposedly private) attachments linked to these notes by accessing the corresponding file download URL directly.

criterions.comment: mantis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
